attributes.action: Include Sinovac-CoronaVac on the approved vaccines for entering the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
The Sinovac-CoronaVac was produced in strict compliance with the norms and guidelines established by the main international regulatory agencies.

Given the facts, the World Health Organization recommended and approved the use of the Sinovac-CoronaVac vaccine and for the reasons outlined above, we are asking the UK Government to consider exempting from quarantine individuals who have been double vaccinated with Sinovac-CoronaVac against Covid-19. Thank you.
attributes.background: It is with great humility that we would like to ask your excellencies' attention including the Sinovac-CoronaVac vaccine against Covid -19 on the approved vaccine's list for entering the UK when traveling from abroad.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594456
